caption.title: DFT calculations of the ORR activity on Fe,Mn/N–C and Fe/N–C catalysts.
caption.p: The optimized structure of ( a) Fe/N–C and ( c) Fe,Mn/N–C. Optimized atomic structures for the main process of an ORR: b Fe/N–C and d Fe,Mn/N–C. e The pathways for Fe,Mn/N–C are summarized at U = 0 V, 0.72 V, and 1.23 V, respectively. f pH-corrected free energy diagram of the Fe,Mn/N 6-1.
